## `SetGraphColorScheme`

Sets the graph color scheme for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetGraphColorScheme(string colorScheme)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` colorScheme | The color scheme ID. |

::: {.tipsection data-latex=""}
Available named color schemes are: `"dusk"`, `"earthtones"`, `"decade1920s"`, , `"decade1940s"`, `"decade1950s"`,
`"decade1960s"`, `"decade1970s"`, `"decade1980s"`,`"decade1990s"`, `"decade2000s"`, `"october"`,
`"slytherin"`, `"campfire"`, `"coffeeshop"`,`"arcticchill"`,`"backtoschool"`, `"boxofchocolates"`,
`"cosmopolitan"`,`"dayandnight"`, `"freshflowers"`,`"icecream"`, `"urbanoasis"`, `"typewriter"`,
`"tastywaves"`, `"spring"`, `"shabbychic"`, `"rollingthunder"`, `"producesection"`,
`"nautical"`, `"semesters"`, `"seasons"`, and `"meadowsunset"`.
:::
